description:
12.14 roberts_opencl
Apply the Roberts cross operator (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roberts_cross) to input video stream.

The filter accepts the following option:
name: roberts_opencl

options.description: Set which planes to filter. Default value is 0xf, by which all planes are processed.
options.name: planes

options.description: Set value which will be multiplied with filtered result. Range is [0.0, 65535] and default value is 1.0.
options.name: scale

options.description: Set value which will be added to filtered result. Range is [-65535, 65535] and default value is 0.0.
options.name: delta
